results.title: Chronic dosing with metformin plus bosentan decreases in vitro pulmonary artery contraction from isolated arteries in adults with pulmonary hypertension
results.text_hl: ... Conclusion: Adding @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ to @CHEMICAL_Bosentan @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000077300 @@@bosentan@@@ therapy in @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ with @DISEASE_Pulmonary_Arterial_Hypertension @DISEASE_MESH:D000081029 @@@PAH@@@-@DISEASE_Heart_Defects_Congenital @DISEASE_MESH:D006330 @@@CHD@@@ decreased in vitro @<m>DISEASE_Stenosis_Pulmonary_Artery</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D000071079 @@@pulmonary artery@@@ contraction induced by PE, which is possibly related to increased @GENE_PRKAA2 @GENE_5563 @@@AMPK@@@ phosphorylation.

citations.NLM: Liao S, Li D, Hui Z, McLachlan CS, Zhang Y. Chronic dosing with metformin plus bosentan decreases in vitro pulmonary artery contraction from isolated arteries in adults with pulmonary hypertension J Cardiovasc Thorac Res. 2019;11(3):189-195. PMID: 31579458
